mapper.select:
SELECT A.CMS_MENU_SEQ, A.TITLE, COALESCE(A.SUB_PATH, '/') AS SUB_PATH FROM MC_CMS_MENU A
WHERE A.PARENT_MENU_SEQ = 0 AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ, sg.PARENT_MENU_SEQ, sg.TITLE, sg.MENU_ORDER, sg.SITE_ID, sg.MENU_URL, sg.MANAGE_URL, sg.TARGET_URL, sg.BLANK_YN, sg.CHILD_TYPE, sg.TOP_YN, sg.MENU_TYPE, sg.DEL_YN, sg.USE_YN , sg2.MENU_LEVEL, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH_MENU(sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ, '>') AS PAGE_NAVI, sys_connect_by_path_menu_order(sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ, '_') AS order_menu_set FROM ( SELECT start_with_connect_by_memu() AS PARENT_MENU_SEQ, @level AS MENU_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT @start_with := ifnull(#{site_id}, '1'), @id := @start_with, @level := 0, @rn := 0 ) vars, MC_CMS_MENU ) sg2 JOIN MC_CMS_MENU sg ON sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ = sg2.PARENT_MENU_SEQ ORDER BY order_menu_set

SELECT sg.*, sg2.MENU_LEVEL, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH_MENU(sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ, '>') AS PAGE_NAVI, sys_connect_by_path_menu_order(sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ, '_') AS order_menu_set FROM ( SELECT start_with_connect_by_memu() AS PARENT_MENU_SEQ, @level AS MENU_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT @start_with := ifnull(#{site_id}, '1'), @id := @start_with, @level := 0, @rn := 0 ) vars, MC_CMS_MENU WHERE @id IS NOT NULL ) sg2 JOIN MC_CMS_MENU sg ON sg.CMS_MENU_SEQ = sg2.PARENT_MENU_SEQ ORDER BY order_menu_set
SELECT A.*, B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.BOARD_NM AS B_PROGRAM_NM FROM MC_CMS_MENU A LEFT OUTER JOIN MC_BOARD B ON A.BOARD_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}
mapper.update:
INSERT INTO MC_CMS_MENU( TITLE, PARENT_MENU_SEQ, MENU_ORDER, CONTS, HEAD_HTML, USE_YN, BLANK_YN, MENU_TYPE, SITE_ID, PROGRAM_NM, CHILD_TYPE, TEMPLATE_TYPE, MENU_URL, ADD_PARAM, CUD_GROUP_SEQ, R_GROUP_SEQ, MANAGE_URL, INNER_YN, TARGET_URL, TOP_YN, CCL_TYPE ,NURI_TYPE ,TAG_NAMES,
BOARD_SEQ,
REG_ID, REG_NM, REG_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_NM, MOD_DT, CMOD_ID, CMOD_NM, CMOD_DT) VALUES( #{title}, #{parent_menu_seq}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(MENU_ORDER),0)+1 FROM MC_CMS_MENU t1 WHERE parent_menu_seq=#{parent_menu_seq}), #{conts}, #{head_html}, #{use_yn}, #{blank_yn}, #{menu_type}, #{site_id}, #{program_nm}, #{child_type}, #{template_type}, #{menu_url}, #{add_param}, #{cud_group_seq}, #{r_group_seq}, #{manage_url}, #{inner_yn}, #{target_url}, #{top_yn}, #{ccl_type}, #{nuri_type}, #{tag_names},
#{board_seq},
#{session_member_id}, #{session_member_nm}, sysdate(), #{session_member_id}, #{session_member_nm}, sysdate(), #{session_member_id}, #{session_member_nm}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT CAST(@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SIGNED) AS RN, TB.* FROM( SELECT * FROM MC_CMS_MENU_BAKUP WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq} ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) AS TB, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R )AS A WHERE CEIL(RN/IFNULL(#{rows},10))=IFNULL(#{cpage},1)
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(1)/IFNULL(#{rows}, 10)) TOTALPAGE, COUNT(1) TOTALCOUNT FROM MC_CMS_MENU_BAKUP WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}

SELECT A.*, (SELECT GROUP_NM FROM MC_GROUP WHERE GROUP_SEQ = (SELECT GROUP_SEQ FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = A.CMOD_ID)) AS GROUP_NM FROM ( SELECT CAST(@ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS SIGNED) AS RN, TB.* FROM( SELECT * FROM MC_CMS_CONTENT_BAKUP WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq} ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) AS TB, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R )AS A WHERE CEIL(RN/IFNULL(#{rows},10))=IFNULL(#{cpage},1)
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(1)/IFNULL(#{rows}, 10)) TOTALPAGE, COUNT(1) TOTALCOUNT FROM MC_CMS_CONTENT_BAKUP WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}

SELECT B.CMS_MENU_SEQ, B.PARENT_MENU_SEQ FROM ( SELECT start_with_connect_by_memu() AS PARENT_MENU_SEQ, @level AS MENU_LEVEL FROM (SELECT @start_with := #{cms_menu_seq}, @id := @start_with, @level := 0, @rn := 0) AS VARS, MC_CMS_MENU ) AS A INNER JOIN MC_CMS_MENU B ON B.CMS_MENU_SEQ = A.PARENT_MENU_SEQ ORDER BY B.PARENT_MENU_SEQ, B.CMS_MENU_SEQ
SELECT CMS_STAFF_SEQ, CMS_MENU_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_NM, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_ID, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, ORDER_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_STAFF WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}
SELECT MEMBER_ID, CMS_MENU_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_STAFF WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{member_id}
SELECT MEMBER_ID, CMS_MENU_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_PERMISSION WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{member_id}
SELECT SEQ, CMS_MENU_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, ORDER_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_STAFF_GROUP WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}
SELECT CMS_STAFF_SEQ, CMS_MENU_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_NM, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_ID, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM, ORDER_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_PERMISSION WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO MC_CMS_STAFF( CMS_MENU_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_NM, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_SEQ, REG_ID, REG_NM, REG_DT )VALUES( #{cms_menu_seq}, #{group_seq}, (SELECT GROUP_NM FROM MC_GROUP WHERE GROUP_SEQ=#{group_seq}), #{member_nm}, #{member_id}, #{order_seq}, #{session_member_id}, #{session_member_nm}, sysdate() )

INSERT INTO MC_CMS_PERMISSION( CMS_MENU_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_NM, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_SEQ, REG_ID, REG_NM, REG_DT )VALUES( #{cms_menu_seq}, #{group_seq}, (SELECT GROUP_NM FROM MC_GROUP WHERE GROUP_SEQ=#{group_seq}), #{member_nm}, #{member_id}, #{order_seq}, #{session_member_id}, #{session_member_nm}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MC_CMS_STAFF WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{cms_menu_seq} AND MEMBER_ID=#{member_id}
DELETE FROM MC_CMS_PERMISSION WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{cms_menu_seq} AND MEMBER_ID=#{member_id}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO MC_CMS_STAFF_GROUP( CMS_MENU_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_NM, ORDER_SEQ, REG_ID, REG_NM, REG_DT )VALUES( #{cms_menu_seq}, #{group_seq}, #{group_nm}, #{order_seq}, #{session_member_id}, #{session_member_nm}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT CONTS, TITLE, CCL_TYPE, NURI_TYPE, TAG_NAMES FROM MC_CMS_MENU A WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ=#{cms_menu_seq}

SELECT CMS_MENU_SEQ, TITLE, BLANK_YN, CONTS, PARENT_MENU_SEQ, MENU_URL, DEL_YN, USE_YN FROM MC_CMS_MENU WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ = (select PARENT_MENU_SEQ from MC_CMS_MENU where CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{cms_menu_seq}) union all SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CMS_MENU_SEQ, TITLE, BLANK_YN, CONTS, PARENT_MENU_SEQ, MENU_URL, DEL_YN, USE_YN FROM MC_CMS_MENU C WHERE C.PARENT_MENU_SEQ = ( SELECT CMS_MENU_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_MENU a WHERE DEL_YN='N' AND CMS_MENU_SEQ = (select PARENT_MENU_SEQ from MC_CMS_MENU where CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{cms_menu_seq}) AND CHILD_TYPE='2' ) AND C.DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY MENU_ORDER )t1

SELECT a.CMS_STAFF_SEQ, a.CMS_MENU_SEQ, a.GROUP_SEQ, a.GROUP_NM, a.MEMBER_NM, a.MEMBER_ID, a.ORDER_SEQ, b.TEL FROM MC_CMS_STAFF a LEFT OUTER JOIN MC_MEMBER b ON a.MEMBER_ID = b.MEMBER_ID WHERE a.CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{cms_menu_seq} ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ ASC
SELECT CMS_MENU_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_MENU WHERE MENU_URL = #{menu_url}
SELECT CMS_MENU_SEQ FROM MC_CMS_STAFF_GROUP WHERE GROUP_SEQ = (SELECT GROUP_SEQ FROM MC_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{session_member_id})
SELECT * FROM MC_FAVORITES WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{session_member_id} ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ ASC

update.selectKey: SELECT COUNT(1) as cnt FROM MC_CMS_MENU_TOGGLE WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{session_member_id} AND TITLE=#{title}

mapper.select: SELECT INFO FROM MC_CMS_MENU_TOGGLE WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{session_member_id} AND TITLE=#{title}
SELECT ADD_YN, MOD_YN, VIEW_YN FROM MC_CMS_MANAGE_AUTH_DETAIL WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{member_id} AND CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{menu_seq}
SELECT * FROM MC_CMS_MENU_LIBS WHERE CMS_MENU_SEQ = #{cms_menu_seq} ORDER BY ORDER_SEQ ASC
